oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Dixie Durene: controlled manufacture in action booklet, circa 1950
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Booklet produced by Dixie Mercerizing Company explaining the yarn manufacturing process at its textile plants in Chattanooga, Tennessee, and at subsidiary Rockfish-Mebane Yarn Mills in North Carolina. The booklet gives an overview of Lupton City, a company town for employees of Dixie Spinning Mills in Chattanooga.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Cotton manufacture; Cotton textiles; Cotton textile industry; Factories; House organs; Industrial sites; Quality control
The Dixie Group
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:publisher: Chattanooga Public Library; University of Tennessee at Chattanooga
